Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
local PackageLib = require(836581200)
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService")
GuiHandler = script:WaitForChild("GuiHandler")
BasePart = Instance.new("Part") BasePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BasePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic BasePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom BasePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) BasePart.CanCollide = true BasePart.Locked = true BasePart.Anchored = false
BaseProjectile = BasePart:Clone() BaseProjectile.Name = "Projectile" BaseProjectile.Size = Vector3.new(1.3, 0.5, 0.2) BaseProjectile.CanCollide = false BowTieMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") BowTieMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh BowTieMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=191294895" BowTieMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=191269030" BowTieMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2) BowTieMesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) BowTieMesh.Parent = BaseProjectile
BowTie = Instance.new("Accessory") BowTie.Name = "BlackBowTie" BowTie.AttachmentPoint = CFrame.new(0, 1.4, 0.5, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1) BowTieHandle = BaseProjectile:Clone() BowTieHandle.Name = "Handle" BowTieHandle.CanCollide = true BowTieHandle.Parent = BowTie
Outfits = { Assets = {191344083}, Suits = { { Name = "The Londoner", Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=191387352", Assets = {124909182, 124909333, 124909400, 124909450, 124909574, 124909603} }, { Name = "The Crook", Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=191387330", Assets = {116791307, 116791347, 116791368, 116791410, 116791445, 116791503} }, { Name = "Chicago News Man", Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=191387286", Assets = {122329350, 122329449, 122329493, 122329521, 122329554, 122329611} }, { Name = "Basic Black Tuxedo", Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=191387263", Assets = {14463095, 12786197, 12786204, 27112025, 27112039, 27112052, 27112056, 27112068} }, { Name = "Basic White Tuxedo", Image = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=191387408", Assets = {186956940, 188258102, 188409259, 27112025, 27112039, 27112052, 27112056, 27112068} } } }
CurrentIndex = 1
MaxFramesDisplayed = 3 MainFrameSize = UDim2.new(0, 200, 0, 300) FrameSize = (MainFrameSize.Y.Offset / MaxFramesDisplayed) OutfitGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") OutfitGui.Name = "OutfitGui" ScrollingFrame = Instance.new("ScrollingFrame") ScrollingFrame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new((0 / 255), (0 / 255), (0 / 255)) ScrollingFrame.BorderColor3 = Color3.new((0 / 255), (0 / 255), (0 / 255)) ScrollingFrame.BorderSizePixel = 2 ScrollingFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.35 ScrollingFrame.Size = MainFrameSize ScrollingFrame.CanvasPosition = Vector2.new(0, 0) ScrollingFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 25, 0, 25, 0) ScrollingFrame.ZIndex = 1 ScrollingFrame.Parent = OutfitGui for i, v in pairs(Outfits.Suits) do local ImageButton = Instance.new("ImageButton") ImageButton.Name = v.Name ImageButton.Image = v.Image ImageButton.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new((75 / 255), (75 / 255), (75 / 255)) ImageButton.BorderColor3 = Color3.new((0 / 255), (0 / 255), (0 / 255)) ImageButton.BackgroundTransparency = 0.75 ImageButton.ImageColor3 = Color3.new((255 / 255), (255 / 255), (255 / 255)) ImageButton.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0, FrameSize) ImageButton.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, (FrameSize * (i - 1))) ImageButton.ZIndex = 2 local Index = Instance.new("IntValue") Index.Name = "Index" Index.Value = i Index.Parent = ImageButton if i == #Outfits.Suits then ScrollingFrame.CanvasSize = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, (ImageButton.Position.Y.Offset + ImageButton.Size.Y.Offset)) end ImageButton.Parent = ScrollingFrame end
Grips = { Equipped = CFrame.new(0.15, -0.2, 0, 0.968230426, 0, 0.250059545, 0, 1, -0, -0.250059515, 0, 0.968230546), Unequipped = CFrame.new(0.15, -0.2, 0, 0.99999994, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1) }
Animations = { Equip = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("Equip"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}, R15Equip = {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("R15Equip"), FadeTime = nil, Weight = nil, Speed = nil, Duration = nil}, }
Sounds = { Fire = Handle:WaitForChild("Fire") }
Gravity = workspace.Gravity
ReloadTime = 5
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
Tool.Grip = Grips.Unequipped Tool.Enabled = true
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if player == Player then if Mode == "MouseClick" and Value.Down then Activated() elseif Mode == "KeyPress" then local Key = Value.Key local Down = Value.Down elseif Mode == "SetIndex" and Value then CurrentIndex = ((Value.Index > #Outfits.Suits and #Outfits.Suits) or (Value.Index < 0 and 1) or Value.Index) elseif Mode == "GetIndex" then return {Index = CurrentIndex} end end end)
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ClientReturn = nil pcall(function() ClientReturn = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ClientReturn end
function InsertAsset(AssetId) local AssetModel = InsertService:LoadAsset(AssetId) local Asset = (AssetModel:FindFirstChild("R15") and AssetModel:FindFirstChild("R6") and AssetModel:Clone()) or AssetModel:GetChildren()[1]:Clone() if AssetModel and AssetModel.Parent then AssetModel:Destroy() end return Asset end
function GetSpecifiedClasses(Parent, Classes) local Instances = {} local function GetClasses(Parent) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do local ClassFound = false for ii, vv in pairs(Classes) do if v:IsA(vv) then ClassFound = true end end if ClassFound then table.insert(Instances, v) end GetClasses(v) end end GetClasses(Parent) return Instances end
function DressCharacter(character, Objects) if not character or not character.Parent then return end local Head = character:FindFirstChild("Head") for i, v in pairs(Objects) do local Object = v:Clone() if v:IsA("Accessory") then local handle = v:FindFirstChild("Handle") if handle and Head then handle = handle:Clone() handle.Name = v.Name local FakeHat = Instance.new("StringValue") FakeHat.Name = "FakeHat" FakeHat.Parent = handle local HeadWeld = Instance.new("Weld") HeadWeld.Name = "HeadWeld" HeadWeld.Part0 = Head HeadWeld.Part1 = handle HeadWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0.5, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1) HeadWeld.C1 = CFrame.new( v.AttachmentPos.X, --Pos X v.AttachmentPos.Y, --Pos Y v.AttachmentPos.Z, --Pos Z math.abs(v.AttachmentRight.X), --R00 v.AttachmentUp.X, --R01 math.abs(v.AttachmentForward.X), --R02 v.AttachmentRight.Y, --R10 v.AttachmentUp.Y, --R11 (math.abs(v.AttachmentForward.Y) * -1), --R12 v.AttachmentRight.Z, --R20 v.AttachmentUp.Z, --R21 math.abs(v.AttachmentForward.Z) --R22 ) HeadWeld.Parent = handle handle.Parent = character end elseif v:IsA("Clothing") then Object.Parent = character elseif v:FindFirstChild("R15") and v:FindFirstChild("R6") then PackageLib.ApplyBodyPart(character, v.R15, v.R6) end end end
function PositionPart(Part, X, Y, Z) local PartClone = Part:Clone() local PartCloneY = PartClone:Clone() PartCloneY.CFrame = PartCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(-math.rad(90), 0, 0) PartCloneY.CFrame = PartCloneY.CFrame - PartCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * Y local PartCloneZ = PartCloneY:Clone() PartCloneZ.CFrame = PartCloneZ.CFrame + PartClone.CFrame.lookVector * Z local PartCloneX = PartCloneZ:Clone() PartCloneX.CFrame = PartCloneZ.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(90), 0) PartCloneX.CFrame = PartCloneX.CFrame - PartCloneX.CFrame.lookVector * X return PartCloneX.CFrame end
function FireProjectile(SpawnPosition, TargetPosition) local Force = 150 local Projectile = BaseProjectile:Clone() local Mass = (Projectile:GetMass() * Gravity) TargetPosition = ((not TargetPosition and (SpawnPosition + Handle.CFrame.lookVector * 2).p) or TargetPosition) local Direction = CFrame.new(SpawnPosition.p, TargetPosition) local Orientation = (Direction + Direction.lookVector * (Projectile.Size.Y * 0.5)) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0) local Velocity = Direction.lookVector * Force local BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(Mass, Mass, Mass) BodyVelocity.velocity = Velocity BodyVelocity.Parent = Projectile Projectile.Velocity = Velocity local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge) BodyGyro.cframe = Orientation BodyGyro.Parent = Projectile Debris:AddItem(Projectile, 5) Projectile.Parent = workspace Projectile.CFrame = Orientation return Projectile end
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false Sounds.Fire:Play() local SpawnPosition = PositionPart(Handle, -0.1, 0.5, ((Handle.Size.Z * 0.5) - 0.06)) local TargetPosition = InvokeClient("MousePosition") local Projectile = FireProjectile(SpawnPosition, TargetPosition) Projectile.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent then return end if Hit.Parent ~= Tool then Projectile:Destroy() end local character = Hit.Parent if character:IsA("Accessory") or character:IsA("Tool") and character.Parent then character = character.Parent end local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then local Outfit = Outfits.Suits[1] local AppearanceAssets = GetSpecifiedClasses(character, {"Accessory", "Clothing", "CharacterMesh", "MeshPart"}) for i, v in pairs(character:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") and v:FindFirstChild("FakeHat") then table.insert(AppearanceAssets, v) end end local NewAppearanceAssets = {} for i, v in pairs(Outfits.Suits[CurrentIndex].Assets) do table.insert(NewAppearanceAssets, v) end for i, v in pairs(NewAppearanceAssets) do NewAppearanceAssets[i] = InsertAsset(v) end table.insert(NewAppearanceAssets, BowTie:Clone()) DressCharacter(character, NewAppearanceAssets) for i, v in pairs(AppearanceAssets) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end end end) wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) PlayerGui = Player:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.Animation then InvokeClient("Preload", v.Animation.AnimationId) end end if Humanoid then if Humanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R15 then InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animations.R15Equip) elseif Humanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R6 then InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animations.Equip) end end
Tool.Grip = Grips.Equipped if PlayerGui then OutfitGuiClone = OutfitGui:Clone() local GuiHandlerClone = GuiHandler:Clone() GuiHandlerClone.Disabled = false GuiHandlerClone.Parent = OutfitGuiClone local ServerControlValue = Instance.new("ObjectValue") ServerControlValue.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControlValue.Value = ServerControl ServerControlValue.Parent = OutfitGuiClone OutfitGuiClone.Parent = PlayerGui end end
function Unequipped() if OutfitGuiClone and OutfitGuiClone.Parent then OutfitGuiClone:Destroy() end for i, v in pairs(Animations) do InvokeClient("StopAnimation", v) end for i, v in pairs(Sounds) do InvokeClient("StopSound", v) v:Stop() end Tool.Grip = Grips.Unequipped end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped) workspace:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Gravity"):Connect(function() Gravity = workspace.Gravity end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
ScreenGui = script.Parent ScrollingFrame = ScreenGui:WaitForChild("ScrollingFrame")
ServerControl = ScreenGui:WaitForChild("ServerControl").Value
FrameSize = ScrollingFrame.Position
ScrollingFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0, (ScreenGui.AbsoluteSize.X - ScrollingFrame.AbsoluteSize.X - FrameSize.X.Offset), 0, (ScreenGui.AbsoluteSize.Y - ScrollingFrame.AbsoluteSize.Y - FrameSize.Y.Offset))
LastFrame = nil
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) local ServerReturn = nil pcall(function() ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) end) return ServerReturn end
function SelectFrame(Frame) if LastFrame then LastFrame.Frame.BackgroundTransparency = LastFrame.Copy.BackgroundTransparency LastFrame.Frame.BackgroundColor3 = LastFrame.Copy.BackgroundColor3 end if Frame then LastFrame = {Frame = Frame, Copy = Frame:Clone()} InvokeServer("SetIndex", {Index = ((LastFrame.Frame:FindFirstChild("Index") and LastFrame.Frame:FindFirstChild("Index").Value) or 1)}) Frame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.75 Frame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new((0 / 255), (0 / 255), (0 / 255)) end end
FrameInformation = InvokeServer("GetIndex")
for i, v in pairs(ScrollingFrame:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("GuiButton") then local Index = v:FindFirstChild("Index") if Index and Index.Value == FrameInformation.Index then SelectFrame(v) end v.MouseButton1Down:connect(function() SelectFrame(v) end) end end
ScreenGui.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "AbsoluteSize" or Property == "AbsolutePosition" then ScrollingFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0, (ScreenGui.AbsoluteSize.X - ScrollingFrame.AbsoluteSize.X - FrameSize.X.Offset), 0, (ScreenGui.AbsoluteSize.Y - ScrollingFrame.AbsoluteSize.Y - FrameSize.Y.Offset)) end end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") ContentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider")
Animations = {}
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if Mode == "PlayAnimation" and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = Value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(Value.FadeTime, Value.Weight, Value.Speed) elseif Mode == "StopAnimation" and Value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end elseif Mode == "Preload" and Value then ContentProvider:Preload(Value) elseif Mode == "PlaySound" and Value then Value:Play() elseif Mode == "StopSound" and Value then Value:Stop() elseif Mode == "MousePosition" then return PlayerMouse.Hit.p end end)
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) pcall(function() local ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) return ServerReturn end) end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Player.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end PlayerMouse = Player:GetMouse() Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = false}) end) end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end Animations = {} end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
Tool:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Enabled"):Connect(UpdateIcon) Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped)
